text: @MZHemingway @realDonaldTrump Why are you all still talking about OBAMA. Coronavirus, long food lines for free groceries, unemployment Rate at an all time high, people are about to be evicted from their homes and apartments, Stocks are low. I guess it hit different when your not living in the real world.
